programme.title: Russell Howard & Mum: USA Road Trip
programme.desc: Russell and Ninette are joining an alien abductee support group, meeting a woman who can show them how to communicate with extra-terrestrials before they venture out to an alien hot spot in a bid to make contact.

programme.title: Swiped
programme.desc: A womanising college student (Noah Centineo) enlists his nerdy roommate (Kendall Sanders) to code the ultimate hook up app by offering to pay his tuition for MIT but unexpected consequences ensue.

programme.title: Awkward Sexy People
programme.desc: Jeff and Anne, two close friends and co-workers in a suburban high school, are embarrassingly unlucky at love. With nothing else to lose, they hatch a plan to transform themselves over the course of a sex-and-alcohol-fueled summer into the cool, confident people they aspire to be. At first an exhilarating adventure of self-discovery, Jeff and Anne's journey turns into a laugh-out-loud experiment as they lose their identities, their dignity, and quite possibly each other.

programme.title: Walk of Shame
programme.desc: After losing an audition for her dream job, Meghan Miles, a Los Angeles TV news anchor, goes out for an uncharacteristic night of partying. She awakes in a stranger’s bed to a phone message announcing the job is hers, if she can make it to the news station by time of broadcast. Stranded in an unknown area without money, a phone, and a car, Meghan — clad in a provocative yellow dress — embarks on a series of misadventures. As she races to the most important job interview of her life, she finds herself among drug dealers and hookers — all while being pursued by the LAPD, an angry taxi driver, and a young kid with an attitude.

programme.title: Humor Me
programme.desc: Desolate, broke and unable to pay the rent, Nate begrudgingly moves in with his widowed father, Bob (Elliott Gould), in his New Jersey retirement golf community. Bob, always quick with a joke, uses humor to deal with all of life's challenges, even the death of his beloved wife. It drives Nate crazy. Thinking his son could benefit from some discipline, Bob sends Nate to work for Ellis (Willie Carpenter) an older ex-Marine who runs operations at the community. While at work, Nate stumbles on a senior citizen theater troupe staging a musical. Nate agrees to help but quickly realises it won't be easy to get these quirky women to cooperate.

programme.title: Baby On Board
programme.desc: Angela Marks, an ambitious, image-conscious businesswoman working for over-demanding boss Mary. When Angela becomes unexpectedly pregnant at the peak of her career, her life with her divorce attorney husband, Curtis, is turned upside-down. An inconvenient pregnancy leads to a nine-month roller coaster ride as Angela and Curtis try to cope and the interference of best friends Danny and Sylvia escalate the situation into a full-on battle of the sexes...

programme.title: Prince Avalanche
programme.desc: Two highway road workers spend the summer of 1988 away from their city lives. The isolated landscape becomes a place of misadventure as the men find themselves at odds with each other and the women they left behind.

programme.title: Karun
programme.desc: Karun: Misadventures On Iran’s Longest River' - British adventurers Tom Allen and Leon McCarron set out to follow Iran’s longest river, the Karun, by human powered means. Their aim is to go beyond the politics and explore the culture and geography of this most misunderstood of nations and have a great adventure doing so. But despite Tom’s previous experience of travel in Iran, they find that cultural differences run deeper than they’d realised.

programme.title: Wonder Women S1E1 India
programme.desc: In India, the Dalit are the lowest caste in the social order, and girls are especially vulnerable to mistreatment, but a group of young women from the city of Dindigul are breaking tradition by becoming the first female performers in a drumming competition.

programme.title: Saving Warru
programme.desc: Warru, or black-footed rock-wallaby, is one of South Australia's most endangered mammals. In 2007, when numbers dropped below 200 in the remote north-west of the State, the Warru Recovery Team was formed to help save the precious species from extinction. Bringing together contemporary science, practical on-ground threat management and traditional Anangu ecological knowledge, this unique decade-long program has recently celebrated the release of dozens of warru to the wild for the first time.

programme.title: Ancient Grains - Amaranth
programme.desc: When you open your pantry, do images of the rugged mountains of South America, the colorful tablelands of Africa and the fertile river valleys of the Middle East dance before your eyes? If not, you have yet to discover amaranth, quinoa, spelt, kamut and teff, the quintet of nutritional powerhouses known as the ancient grains. The legends behind their origins many millennia past, their loss over time and their ultimate modern revival - literally tell the story of civilization.

programme.title: Aina
programme.desc: ‘ĀINA: That Which Feeds Us’ – The best-kept secret on Kaua`i isn’t a secluded beach or local surf spot, it’s that four of the world’s largest chemical companies are using the island as an open-air testing ground for pesticides on genetically modified crops. Winner Accolades Global Film Competition.

programme.title: Black Sunday
programme.desc: A detailed report of the Holocaust in Romania. During World War II, two trains were loaded with Jews. Where they will be taken? To their deaths. Four survivors of Romanian Holocaust tell us what happened in Iasi during the Pogrom, a horror which took place on June 29, 1941. Over 13,000 people died in that single day, a day which has become known as Black Sunday in remembrance of those who lost their lives.

programme.title: Shifting Ice + Changing Tides
programme.desc: ‘Shifting Ice and Changing Tides’ is a human and wind powered, female led, ski and sail expedition to the west coast of Greenland. In this remote, fascinating and beautiful region, six women will explore and ski first descents while limiting their environmental footprint by sailing and climbing.

programme.title: Only Me Generation
programme.desc: Has China’s ‘one child policy’ really created a generation of spoilt, privileged, selfish young adults? This documentary is a brave expose of what everyday life is like for the ‘Only Me’ generation in China. For the first time on camera, these young Chinese will speak candidly of the huge pressure and high expectations from their parents and reveal the dreams, worries, hopes and fears of a generation.

programme.title: Cromwells Head
programme.desc: The story of Oliver Cromwell's head is perhaps the most bizarre, yet least well known, of all tales from English history. From regal burial, to exhumation and decapitation, this relic of our only non-royal ruler has travelled a most peculiar path.

programme.title: The Secrets of La Roja – World Champions 2010
programme.desc: On the 11th July 2010, Spain’s national team reached its goal of winning the World Cup, a victory that was felt by the team and nation as a whole. Despite this successful ending, “La Roja” had to overcome various struggles and difficulties in order to become legendary. The team arrived in South Africa with the triumph of the 2008 European Football Championship under their belt and Vicente del Bosque leading the way. There was a general feeling of favoritism attributed to ""La Roja"" and while the defeat against Switzerland in the first match came as a shock, it motivated Del Bosque and his team to come together and focus on one intention: good football and one goal: to make history.

programme.title: MessiCirque
programme.desc: We will see the formative moments, the creative and artistic development, Messi´s participation with the project, training, rehearsals and the "Messi10 Challenge LaLiga". This is the interactive experience that lets you "be Messi for a day", ending with the long-awaited premiere of Messi10 in Barcelona. We will accompany the creators, artists and Messi on a trip from Montreal to Barcelona and discover a story about dreams that come true. MessiCirque combines Cirque du Soleil´s vision to tell, for the first time, the story of a living sports legend with a child´s ambition to play football.

programme.title: Ride Your Dream
programme.desc: Motorcycling was a man’s world, until now. This documentary introduces us to Ana Carrasco, the Spanish rider who has revolutionised the two wheels’ world and who, from an early age, had a clear dream: being world champion. Through intimate conversations with her family and team, we get to know Ana’s motivations, the obstacles she has faced and the dreams she keeps chasing. Her career, from its origins in a small town in Murcia to being the first woman to win the World Championship, is a source of inspiration for anyone. Ana herself is a clear example of overcoming struggle and tenacity, and her story which is full of exciting moments encourages us all to fight for our dreams.

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka grew up poor and at times homeless in the streets of Brazzaville. His mom died when he was 7. His dad was in prison when he was 12. Despite these overwhelming obstaces he achieved his dream of becoming an NBA Champion. This documentary follows Serge on his journey home to the Republic of Congo, to show them the NBA Championship trophy but more importantly he shares a message that through hard work and determination, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: Andrés Iniesta, The Unexpected Hero
programme.desc: This is the story of a normal person who does extraordinary things. Someone who pursues and achieves triumphs through taking care of the small details, because these are, after all, the ones that make him a different soccer player. We all know the Iniesta-magician of the ball, who conquered two triplets with Barça and raised the World Champion Cup with the Spanish National Team. And yes, of course we know their great sporting moments. But who is behind this global sport superstar? Through exceptional witnesses such as Leo Messi, Neymar Jr., Pep Guardiola, Sergio Ramos, Luis Enrique and a long etc.

programme.title: Eighteam
programme.desc: The Chipolopolo is the Zambia national team that at the 1988 Olympic thrashes Italy 4-0 and has their eyes on the Africa Cup of Nations. But in 1993 a Zambian Air Force ditches into the ocean about 500 metres offshore from Gabon. All passengers, including 18 players, die in the accident.The Chipolopolo's captain, Kalusha Bwalya, who is not aboard the ill-fated flight puts his efforts to build a new team and make a professional federation becoming later the national team coach and president of the Football Association of Zambia. Two decades later, destiny makes Zambia a blink: in Gabon, Zambia becomes African champions for the first time after a long penalty shoot-out. There are 18 penalties.

programme.desc: From brains to eyes, hands to legs, and deep down to the internal organs implants, prosthesis and rehabilitation are entering a new era potentially creating a new type of human being - The Bionic Man- in reality, not on retro TV. But what ethical concerns arise as we mix technology with biology?

programme.title: Isabela
programme.desc: A darker look at paradise in the Galapagos archipelago. Environmental artist and world traveller Billy Strong and Filmmaker / Photographer Dell Cullum, both from East Hampton, New York take an unauthorized journey and expedition onto never before landed locations of the Galapagos, to show the devastating effects of ocean-borne trash and debris on it’s shorelines.

programme.title: Animal Society
programme.desc: We explore the Animal Kingdom and look closely at how animal tribes/families live together. The family dynamic – the role of mum and dad, the competition and bonding between the offspring, when do they leave their patch/home to start their own ? We see common themes in how animal families work and live together, protect each other and then go off to fend for themselves across a range of species.

programme.title: Blue World Serie

programme.title: Blue World Serie

programme.title: The Twinning Reaction
programme.desc: In the 1960s Identical twins and triplets were secretly split up in infancy and studied by psychoanalysts for decades. This documentary examines the traumatic, long-term effects of the separations — and continuing deception — on the twins and their adoptive families.

programme.title: Deeper - The Adventure of Ultra Deep Diving
programme.desc: There are more people who have walked on the surface of the Moon than people who have dived below a depth of 800 feet. Pascal Bernabé is one of them. In 1996, still unknown to the public, he accepts to dive 577 feet deep to bring back two robots trapped in a cave. The mission is a success. But Pascal wants more, he becomes addicted to ultra-deep diving. Soon, he makes a new successful attempt to go below 660 feet.

programme.title: Flirting With Flamenco
programme.desc: When Sylvia's well-meaning dad (Watt) surprises her with a devastating revelation, Sylvia's world is turned upside down. But will she crumble or prove herself at the local flamenco contest? An uplifting feel-good Brit comedy drama, Flirting with Flamenco will have you laughing, crying and feeling empowered to turn your life around.

programme.title: The Royal Bodyguard: The Royal Art of Blackmail S01 E04
programme.desc: There’s been a burglary at the Palace and The Queen enlists Hubble to source its culprit. But there is more concern when it appears that the thieves were unwittingly assisted by Hubble, much to Dennis’s joy.David Walliams (Little Britain, Come Fly with Me) joins us in this episode. Guy’s endeavours to make things right put him in a sticky situation.

programme.title: The Royal Bodyguard: The Perils of Attraction S01 E05
programme.desc: Hubble adopts a new persona to root out a mole at Number 10, but his performance is perhaps too convincing, as he bewitches a new colleague and upsets his superior’s wife.

programme.title: The Royal Bodyguard: A Watery Grave S01 E06
programme.desc: The Princess is on her hen do. Hubble is put in charge of security and loses her after an aggressive assault from a gaggle of hen-nighters. Soon there is another mysterious attack with a stone gargoyle. Hubble fears for his life and Yates is employed as his bodyguard. But strange things continue to happen...

programme.title: On A Clear Day
programme.desc: Frank (Peter Mullan) is a hard-working 55 year-old, respected in his local community, who suddenly finds himself without a job. For the first time in his life, Frank is without direction. When his friend Danny (Billy Boyd) jokes that on a clear day he could swim to France, an idea is planted in Frank\’s mind. Concealing his plans from his loving wife Joan (Brenda Blethyn) Frank determines to put his life back together by attempting the ultimate test of endurance – to swim the English Channel. In doing so he cements a broken relationship with his grown-up son.

programme.title: The Agent: The Agent
programme.desc: An actor looking for an agent knocks on the wrong door and finds more than she bargained for - So does the man behind the door.

programme.title: The Bay- The Beginning
programme.desc: Episode 6- Manny arrives at the wedding with a stunning date Tamara Garrett making Marly jealous of her cousin. Lee, not realizing his illegitimate daughter Lianna has followed him, arrives in the parking lot of an abandoned shack directly behind the Garrett Tavern where the mysterious voice ordered him to go. At the alter, Brian gets the shock of his life just as an explosion occurs across town.

programme.title: B-Sides
programme.desc: B-Sides covers Austin City Limits 2021 featuring interviews with performers Tate McRae, PAYDAY, and Jany Green.

programme.title: Street Magic
programme.desc: The One With The Bag of Broken Glass- Angela Funovits freaks out 2 Broke Girls star Matthew Moy with her extraordinary powers of mind reading. Also, Chipper Lowell puts his trust into the public into not getting lacerated, Titou bringing an amazing illusion live to Universal CityWalk, Kevin Viner turns paper into technology, Karl Hein proves he's can quadruple your cash in mere seconds, and Morgan Strebler, in broad daylight surrounded by Hollywood tourists rises floats above the sidewalk!

programme.title: Mysteries, Magic and Miracles
programme.desc: "Math & Mysticism": visualizing sound waves. "Wyoming Prison Ghost": An executed mass murderer wreaks havoc in the prison where he died. "Aura Reading": how to read auras, and what they reveal.

programme.title: World War Four
programme.desc: A series of escalating incidents around the world lead to greater and greater conflict, placing the superpowers at one another's throats. Armies march, bombs rain down, soldiers storm the beaches. One family is caught up in the ever-growing conflict. Can they survive as total war is declared and nuclear weapons are unleashed

programme.title: Laura McKenzie's Traveler
programme.desc: Dublin- O'Donoghue's pub, the Ha' Penny Bridge, Powers Court Center, Oscar Wilde's old home. Laura stops at the National Museum of Ireland, the Temple Bar, and the banks of the River Liffey.

programme.title: B-Sides
programme.desc: B-Sides covers Austin City Limits 2021 featuring interviews with performers Tate McRae, PAYDAY, and Jany Green.

programme.title: The Bay- The Beginning
programme.desc: Episode 7- Marly gets shocking news. Brian finds himself backed into a corner with few options. Sara turns to Commissioner Martin for help. Pete seeks refuge away from the chaotic Garrett estate. Janice has a heart-to-heart discussion with her best friend Christine Nelson, only to soon discover some horrifying news from Lianna. Elliott has a knock at the door that changes his life forever.

programme.title: B-Sides
programme.desc: Nation of Language talk about their newfound exposure during the pandemic and new album. Kah-Lo talks about growing as an artist and plans for new music. Zella Day performs live and more.

programme.title: Street Magic
programme.desc: The One With The Needle Through The Hand- Jonathan Pendragon shows international superstar Ronn Moss his "feet" of magic! Plus Trigg Watson and his tablet of wonder turns images into reality, Eric Ross actually shoves a needle through his hand, Michael Turco re-creates the daily news, Rich Manley leaves a burning impression and Michael Grandinetti levitates himself over Hollywood Boulevard completely surrounded by a hundred witnesses.

programme.title: Mysteries, Magic and Miracles
programme.desc: "Haunted Hollywood Part 1": Are many of Tinseltown's legends still hanging around? "Tarot Reading": can Tarot cards tell us about our pasts, present, and futures? "Marian Visions": sightings of the Virgin Mary and other religious miracles.

programme.title: Innovations
programme.desc: Lou hooks up with keyboardist Patric Johnston while Summer records an original song at a legendary recording studio. Phanie learns about the multicultural history of the accordion aka Texas squeezebox.

programme.title: History Inspires
programme.desc: Phanie gets a lesson in the bajo sexto, a 12-stringed guitar, while Lou meets the owner of Houston’s independent record shop Vinal Edge. Summer tries her hand at graffiti art.

programme.title: The Scene
programme.desc: Summer jams with Nathen Rogers and his band, La Croix Boix. Lou gets a tour of Sugarhill Recording Studio and Phanie’s punk band plays alongside the accordion-powered Tex Mex band Piñata Protest.

programme.title: Boarding Pass Oslo, Norway
programme.desc: Jamie checks out the popular and offbeat attractions of Oslo, the capital of Norway. He also tries the ski jump at nearby Holmenkollen.

programme.title: Unwind The Palace Downtown, Dubai
programme.desc: Sabrina is at Dubai Downtown Palace Hotel, having its lavish suites designed magnificently with middle-eastern themes. She explores Bur Dubai and its traditional market. Then visits the Green Planet bio-dome and later Al Fahidi Fort, ending her day with dinner at Asado restaurant. Next she takes a boat ride down the Dubai canal, exploring the city’s skyline and ending with a visit to Ras Al Khor wildlife Sanctuary.

programme.title: The Food Guide Budapest, Hungary
programme.desc: Joe in Budapest relishes Hungarian langos and schnitzels. But the experience of having a four-course meal in a boat is thrilling, to say the least.

programme.title: Backpack Sjenica, Serbia
programme.desc: On her journey in Sjenica, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries the locally prepared pie, visits the Kopaonik National Park and ends her day at the beautiful Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: Backpack Gran Canaria, Spain
programme.desc: Heather visits Casa De Colon museum, a rum cellar and then Puerto de Mogan. Later she explores Maspalomas Dunes and wraps her day after trying chestnut mousse.

programme.title: Unwind Earl's Regency, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya arrives at Earl’s Regency and explores its spiritual and cultural aspects. She visits a wildlife sanctuary, tries a traditional meal, enjoys an Ayurvedic massage and a traditional dance performance and ends her day with exploring the surroundings of Kandy lake.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun Hanoi, Vietnam
programme.desc: In Hanoi, Rohan relishes local delicacies like Pho and Bun Cha. Post which, he visits historic sights, rides a Cyclo, enjoys a water puppet show, explores the Old Quarter and refreshed himself with a glass of beer at Beer Corner.

programme.title: World Heritage Hill Forts Of Rajasthan, India
programme.desc: Travel back in time and explore three of the magnificent hill-forts of Rajasthan, starting with Chittorgarh Fort followed by Kumbalgarh fort and Ranthambore fort, which are more than just museums.

programme.title: City Breaks Bukhara, Uzbekistan(EN)
programme.desc: Travel with Alexandra, as she unravels the secrets of the ancient Uzbek city of Bukhara. From exploring the ancient fortress to local bazaars along with visiting a traditional carpet factory.

programme.title: World Heritage The Sculptures of Khajuraho, India
programme.desc: Visit Khajuraho temples, that is a vivid illustration of the principle, showcasing an eternal bond between earthly bliss and spiritual satisfaction and has sculptures of not deities but of humans.

programme.title: Backpack Tenerife 2, Spain
programme.desc: Heather tries Paella, visits Los Gigantes village and also the Pyramids of Guimar. She also enjoys stargazing atop El Teide and tries jet skiing at Playa del Duque, ending at Siam water park.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun Banff, Canada
programme.desc: Alex Drobin escapes to the rugged beauty of Banff, Canada’s first national park, where he explores the Cave and Basin National Historic Site, goes to Bow Valley Parkway to spot wildlife and has a cowboy experience at Banff Trail Riders. He also tries smoked buffalo flatbread and beer from a local brewery.

programme.title: Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya visits Oriole Villas where she explores Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish, witnesses a traditional dance performance, followed by a visit to Galapath temple and Sea turtle hatchery the next day and ends the day with a visit to a water sport center.

programme.title: Asia Unplated with Diana Chan
programme.desc:
Asia Unplated follows Diana Chan as she explores the fresh, aromatic flavours of Asia. Each episode focuses on a different cuisine, showcasing a variety of traditional and modern dishes from each country.
Along the way, we join Diana as she explores the local shops, restaurants and markets, providing tips and advice for sourcing ingredients for each dish.
Then it’s back to her kitchen where Diana cooks up simple but authentic, home-style Asian dishes. She also invites special guests, friends and passionate foodies into the kitchen to show us their favourite recipes and chat about the unique cooking styles and rich food histories of their favorite Asian cuisines.

programme.title: Asia Unplated with Diana Chan
programme.desc:
Asia Unplated follows Diana Chan as she explores the fresh, aromatic flavours of Asia. Each episode focuses on a different cuisine, showcasing a variety of traditional and modern dishes from each country.
Along the way, we join Diana as she explores the local shops, restaurants and markets, providing tips and advice for sourcing ingredients for each dish.
Then it’s back to her kitchen where Diana cooks up simple but authentic, home-style Asian dishes. She also invites special guests, friends and passionate foodies into the kitchen to show us their favourite recipes and chat about the unique cooking styles and rich food histories of their favorite Asian cuisines.

With the escaped concentration camp prisoner Hans Steinbrück they plan acts of sabotage, until the Gestapo take them on with their full might. When they're arrested, Karl is torn between his will to survive, his feelings of responsibility, his love for his brother and his loyalty to the Edelweiss Pirates.

programme.title: The Boxing Girls of Kabul
programme.desc: A group of young Afghan women train to represent their country as boxers in the 2012 Olympics.

programme.title: Examined Life
programme.desc: Examined Life pulls philosophy out of academic journals and classrooms, and puts it back on the streets. In Examined Life, filmmaker Astra Taylor accompanies some of today's most influential thinkers on a series of unique excursions through places and spaces that hold particular resonance for them and their ideas. Peter Singer's thoughts on the ethics of consumption are amplified against the backdrop of Fifth Avenue's posh boutiques. Michael Hardt ponders the nature of revolution while surrounded by symbols of wealth and leisure. Judith Butler and a friend stroll through San Francisco's Mission District questioning our culture's fixation on individualism. And while driving through Manhattan, Cornel West - perhaps America's best-known public intellectual - compares philosophy to jazz and blues, reminding us how intense and invigorating a life of the mind can be. Offering privileged moments with great thinkers from fields ranging from moral philosophy to cultural theory, Examined Life ...

programme.title: The Street
programme.desc: Inspired by the homonymous short story by Montreal author, Mordecai Richler, Caroline Leaf's paint-on-glass animated fable attempts to probe into the diverse emotional reactions of a tightly-knit Jewish family to an ailing and dying grandmother. However, not all members feel the same. Some of them are devastated, some are stoical--while, others--can't wait to see a pending promise fulfilled.

programme.title: The Chocolate Diet - A Scientific Hoax Goes Viral
programme.desc: Get slimmer by eating chocolate - how scientific studies will make us believe the stupidest things!

programme.desc: Zane, an astronomer, discovers intelligent alien life. But the aliens are keeping a deadly secret.

programme.title: The Wraith
programme.desc: Jake appears after a boy is killed by a drag-racing gang. A strange black car hunts down members of the gang.

programme.title: Mothman
programme.desc: Ten years after covering up a drowning, the Mothman has come to seek vengeance on a group of friends!

programme.title: Goblin

programme.title: The Bouquet
programme.desc: Two estranged sisters torn apart by their differences suddenly find themselves working together towards a common goal in this heartwarming drama...For years, overachiever Terri (Kristy Swanson) and her idealistic sister, Mandy (Alberta Mayne), have kept their distance from each other, as well as from their parents’ struggling florist business. But when a tragic turn of events brings both women home, they discover just how much they need one another in order to continue their family legacy. Filled with romance, humor and hope, it’s an endearing story about making time for the ones you love.

programme.title: Advance and Retreat
programme.desc: An ambitious junior executive is reunited with her first love at a corporate retreat, ultimately realizing that she might have to take a step back to make a leap forward.

programme.title: Fatal Performance
programme.desc: A struggling actress is hired to impersonate a woman for a business meeting, but soon finds her life in danger.

programme.title: Diagnosis Delicious
programme.desc: A young surgeon, Nina, must make nice with a celebrity chef after she's tasked with bringing him on board for a program in order to clinch her chances for a promotion.

programme.title: Pure Country 2: The Gift
programme.desc: Three angels bestow the gift of song to a young girl, who must follow a series of rules in order hold on to it during her rise to fame and fortune.

programme.title: The Professor
programme.desc: Johnny Depp plays Richard, a buttoned-down college lecturer, whose life is turned upside down after learning he has six months to live. To the shock of his wife (Rosemarie DeWitt: La La Land) and school chancellor (Ron Livingston: The Conjuring) and the delight of his students - Richard embarks on a hilarious crusade against authority, with sex, drugs and bad behaviour in this dark comedy.

programme.title: Muriel's Wedding
programme.desc: A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.

programme.title: Love Me Like You Do
programme.desc: A modern day train hopper fighting to be a successful musician and a single mom battling to maintain custody of her daughter defy their circumstances by coming together in a relationship that may change each other's lives forever.

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: Legends Morgan Freeman, Christopher Walken and William H. Macy, star in this slick and witty comedy crime caper. It was a stroke of genius, but now the perfect crime is turning into a perfect disaster. When three well-serving security guards discover that their most favourite artworks are being sent to another museum, they concoct a plan to switch the real masterpieces with fakes.

programme.title: The Angriest Man in Brooklyn
programme.desc: Comedy legend Robin Williams and Mila Kunis are on fantastic form in this story of lies, lust and love. When a doctor mistakenly diagnoses Henry as having 90 minutes to live, he begins a wildly funny journey to make amends with his family and friends. Featuring eye-wateringly entertaining performances from Peter Dinklage and Melissa Leo, this is a hilarious story of anger management in action!

programme.title: Black or White
programme.desc: Black or White is the story of a grandfather who is suddenly left to care for his beloved granddaughter. When her paternal grandmother seeks custody with the help of her brother, the little girl is torn between two families who love her deeply. With the best intentions at heart, both families fight for what they feel is right and are soon forced to confront their true feelings about race, forgiveness and understanding. Anchored by an all-star cast and inspired by true events, Black or White is a look at two seemingly different worlds, in which nothing is as simple as black or white.

programme.title: Solitary Man
programme.desc: When his perfect world crashes down around him, Ben Kalmen (Michael Douglas) is forced to pick up the pieces and start his quest for success all over again. Once a successful car dealership owner, he embarks on a major comeback but old habits die hard. Once again threatening both his career and family, Ben must learn to control his ongoing lust for every attractive woman he sees, especially one whose influential family connections could make or break his latest business plan.

programme.title: Black Mountain
programme.desc: At a site 100 miles from the nearest native reservation, during a Canadian winter, a group of archaeologists have made a startling discovery: The tip of a mysterious, ancient structure, which bears some archaic engravings. The crew, led by Jensen, attempt to decipher it but some mysteries are better left buried. As they delve further into the structure's origins, things at their camp turn strange. Communications fail, local workers suddenly disappear and the men are stricken with a terrible illness. It's not long before they begin to feel the effects of solitude and then things get really bad...

programme.title: Big Sky
programme.desc: Hazel (Bella Thorne) suffers from a crippling case of agoraphobia. So much so that it causes a rift between her and her mother, Dee (Kyra Sedgwick). Hazel and her mother decide to go on a road trip to a desert facility to help Hazel deal with her fear, but when gunmen and brothers Jesse (Frank Grillo) and Pru (Aaron Tveit) attack them, Hazel has to battle her fears so she and her mother can survive.

programme.title: Mozart and the Whale
programme.desc: A charming and heartfelt romantic drama starring Josh Hartnett and Radha Mitchell. New York taxi driver Donald Morton has Asperger's syndrome, a type of autism. Proficient with numbers but shy around people, Donald organizes a support group for others with his condition. Isabelle Sorenson, who is direct to a fault and practical, but easily upset by any perceived insult, joins the group. The two fall in love, but their mutual difficulty in coping with their condition threatens their fragile relationship.

programme.title: Meek's Cutoff
programme.desc: The year is 1845, the earliest days of the Oregon Trail, and a wagon team of three families has hired the mountain man Stephen Meek to guide them over the Cascade Mountains. Claiming to know a short cut, Meek leads the group on an unmarked path across the high plain desert, only to become lost in the dry rock and sage. Over the coming days, the emigrants must face the scourges of hunger, thirst and their own lack of faith in each other’s instincts for survival. When a Native American wanderer crosses their path, the emigrants are torn between their trust in a guide who has proven himself unreliable and a man who has always been seen as the natural enemy.

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: An innocent discovery of a well-preserved mummified Emperor unearths a 2000-year-old nightmare - a secret that should have remained buried. A team of scientists, who lose a colleague in an ancient labyrinth, must work together to recover him while trying to make the discovery of a century. In their quest to rescue him, they find themselves underground, battling ancient, terrifying Chinese magic and making their way through a swarm of deadly, man-eating spiders – only to uncover the secret behind the insects’ power and intelligence.

programme.title: Rise of the Viking
programme.desc: From the director of epic fantasy favourite, 'Black Sails', and starring 'Breaking Bad's' Jonathan Banks, is historical actioner 'Rise of the Viking'. In the year of 754 AD, during a time of epic battles and bloodshed, the legend of the pagan warrior King Redbad, is born, but so is a new weapon against his people: Christianity. Redbad must ultimately unite a Viking army powerful enough to defeat the seemingly invincible Franks.

programme.title: In the Name of the King: A Dungeon Siege Tale
programme.desc: A man named Farmer sets out to rescue his kidnapped wife and avenge the death of his son - both committed by the Krugs, a race of animal warriors controlled by the evil Gallian

programme.title: Shark Attack 3: Megalodon
programme.desc: Shark Attack 3: Megalodon is a “jaws”-dropping action thriller from the director of Kickboxer starring John Barrowman and Jenny McShane. When two researchers discover a colossal shark's tooth off the Mexican coast their worst fears surface - the most menacing beast to ever rule the waters is still alive and mercilessly feeding on anything that crosses its path.
